name: soralog
description: ecommerce catalog with web-app, dashboard, backend server
author: kresnahendri <kresnahendri@gmail.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm install && npm run migration:mongo-init && npm run start" "cd web && npm install && npm run dev" "cd dashboard && npm install && npm run dev"
scripts.start:no-install: concurrently "cd server && npm run migration:mongo-init && npm run start" "cd web && npm run dev"
